lines:
Shanghai Lan. 
1 er swon

422 Harrison Ave

June reset 
Dr. A.E. Skarne. 
Dear Sir:

Please forward to above 
address the amount of $39.65 which 
is what Mr. 5. 5. Kwan's bill amount 
to. De beg you to bardon na fer 
requesting hat we want to settle 
our bills for the year.

Mr. Kman told me 
that he had acked you to
raw: Shanghai Lan. 1 er swon 422 Harrison Ave June reset Dr. A.E. Skarne. Dear Sir: Please forward to above address the amount of $39.65 which is what Mr. 5. 5. Kwan's bill amount to. De beg you to bardon na fer requesting hat we want to settle our bills for the year. Mr. Kman told me that he had acked you to

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter requesting $39.65 as approved by Mr. Kwan to settle the outstanding balance.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
